mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND reply_status = 1

SELECT r.*, m.member_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l WHERE r.reply_id = l.reply_id AND likes_type = 0) AS likesCount FROM reply r LEFT JOIN member m ON m.member_id = r.member_id WHERE r.member_id = #{memberId} AND r.reply_status = 1 LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM congress_reply WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND congress_reply_status = 1

SELECT cr.congress_reply_id, m.member_id, m.member_name, cr.congress_reply_content, cr.congress_reply_create_date, cr.congress_reply_modify_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l WHERE l.reply_id = cr.congress_reply_id AND likes_type = 1) AS likesCount FROM congress_reply cr INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = cr.member_id INNER JOIN reply r ON r.reply_id = cr.reply_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND cr.congress_reply_status = 1 ORDER BY cr.congress_reply_create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
